# Synthetix Docs&#x20;

## User Docs

- [Getting Started](https://docs.synthetix.io/welcome-to-synthetix-user-docs/getting-started)
- [SNX Staking](https://docs.synthetix.io/welcome-to-synthetix-user-docs/snx-staking): Deposit to the 420 Pool to start earning yield on your SNX
- [Deposit SNX to The 420 Pool](https://docs.synthetix.io/welcome-to-synthetix-user-docs/snx-staking/deposit-snx-to-the-420-pool): Deposit to the 420 Pool to have your debt wiped clean and be free from liquidation risk.
- [420 Pool FAQ](https://docs.synthetix.io/welcome-to-synthetix-user-docs/snx-staking/420-pool-faq)
- [V3 SNX Staking (Deprecated)](https://docs.synthetix.io/welcome-to-synthetix-user-docs/snx-staking/v3-snx-staking-deprecated)
- [V2 SNX Staking on Optimism (Deprecated)](https://docs.synthetix.io/welcome-to-synthetix-user-docs/snx-staking/v3-snx-staking-deprecated/v2-snx-staking-on-optimism-deprecated)
- [Provide Liquidity](https://docs.synthetix.io/provide-liquidity)
- [Fees](https://docs.synthetix.io/provide-liquidity/fees)
- [Debt](https://docs.synthetix.io/provide-liquidity/debt): Wondering why you have accrued debt in your LP position?
- [Trade](https://docs.synthetix.io/trade)
- [Synthetix Exchange](https://docs.synthetix.io/trade/synthetix-exchange)
- [Synthetix Leveraged Tokens](https://docs.synthetix.io/trade/synthetix-leveraged-tokens)
- [Integrators](https://docs.synthetix.io/trade/integrators)
- [Tokens](https://docs.synthetix.io/tokens)
- [Earn yield on sUSD](https://docs.synthetix.io/tokens/earn-yield-on-susd)
- [Synthetix V3](https://docs.synthetix.io/synthetix-v3)
- [Governance](https://docs.synthetix.io/governance)
- [Build on Synthetix V3](https://docs.synthetix.io/build-on-synthetix-v3)
- [Security & Risks](https://docs.synthetix.io/security-and-risks)
- [Brand Assets](https://docs.synthetix.io/brand-assets)
- [Links](https://docs.synthetix.io/links)
- [Product Updates](https://docs.synthetix.io/product-updates): Product updates from Synthetix

* [Understanding the Collateralization Ratio](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/staking/staking-guide/collateralization-ratio)
* [Understanding Debt, Minting, and Burning](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/staking/staking-guide/debt-minting-and-burning-explained)

* [Escrow and Vesting](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/staking/staking-guide/escrow-and-vesting)

* [Staking FAQ](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/staking/staking-faq)
* [Bridging sUSD](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/staking/bridging-susd): Steps for bridging sUSD between Optimism and Ethereum Mainnet

* [Technical Integration](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/integrations/perps-integration-guide/technical-integration)

* [Design Resources](https://docs.synthetix.io/user-docs/v2-user-docs/brand-assets/design-resources): Design best practices for teams building on Synthetix V3

## Synthetix Exchange

- [Getting Started](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/welcome-to-synthetix-exchange/getting-started)
- [Opening A Synthetix Account](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/welcome-to-synthetix-exchange/opening-a-synthetix-account): Synthetix Exchange supports login with email, Google account, or EVM wallet.
- [Bridging to Synthetix Exchange](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/welcome-to-synthetix-exchange/bridging-to-synthetix-exchange): Begin your journey
- [Perps on Synthetix Exchange](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/perps-on-synthetix-exchange): Understand these fundamentals!
- [Margin Types & Collateral](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/margin-types-and-collateral): What & what?
- [Funding](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/funding): Learn about why funding is important
- [Technical Details](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/funding/technical-details)
- [Maker or Taker?](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/maker-or-taker): Learn how these are different on Synthetix Exchange
- [Leverage & Initial/Maintenance Margin](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/leverage-and-initial-maintenance-margin): Leverage, Initial  & Maintenance Margin fundamentals
- [Account Health & Liquidations](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/account-health-and-liquidations): Find out more about managing your risk.
- [Conditional Orders](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/conditional-orders): Learn about conditional order types Stop-Loss (SL) & Take-Profit (TP)
- [Position Modification](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/position-modification): Learn how to modify existing positions using market orders or conditional orders.
- [Gasless One-Click Trading](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/gasless-one-click-trading)
- [Starting/Stopping 1CT](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/gasless-one-click-trading/starting-stopping-1ct): Get started with your seamless trading experience
- [Delegated Trading](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/delegated-trading): Add and manage delegates to trade on your behalf.
- [Getting started with Delegation](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/delegated-trading/getting-started-with-delegation): Set Up delegated access
- [Accessing Accounts Delegated to You](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/delegated-trading/accessing-accounts-delegated-to-you): A guide to help traders who have had trade rights delegated to them from another Synthetix Exchange Smart Margin Account access them.
- [Managing Delegates](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/delegated-trading/managing-delegates)
- [FAQ](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/delegated-trading/faq)
- [Trading Tutorial](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial)
- [Connecting a wallet & V3 Account Creation](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/connecting-a-wallet-and-v3-account-creation): Create your Smart Margin Account
- [Depositing Collateral](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/depositing-collateral)
- [Swapping and Bridging](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/swapping-and-bridging)
- [Enabling one-click trading](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/enabling-one-click-trading)
- [Opening a Position](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/opening-a-position)
- [Closing a Position](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/closing-a-position)
- [Withdrawing Collateral](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-basics/trading-tutorial/withdrawing-collateral)
- [Overview](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/overview)
- [Multi-collateral Margin](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin)
- [Collateral Types](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin/collateral-types)
- [What is USDx?](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin/what-is-usdx): What is USDx?
- [The Mechanics of USDx](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin/the-mechanics-of-usdx): Minting and Burning
- [Edge Cases in Liquidation:](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin/edge-cases-in-liquidation): Understanding Slippage Scenarios
- [Settlement of Debt](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin/settlement-of-debt)
- [FAQ's](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v3-base/multi-collateral-margin/faqs)
- [Introduction (Legacy)](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v2-optimism/introduction-legacy)
- [Getting Started on Optimism](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v2-optimism/getting-started-on-optimism)
- [How to get sUSD](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/perps-v2-optimism/how-to-get-susd)
- [Getting Started](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/infrastructure-overview/getting-started)
- [System Overview](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/infrastructure-overview/system-overview)
- [Account Management](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/infrastructure-overview/account-management)
- [Delegate Management](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/infrastructure-overview/delegate-management)
- [Conditional Orders](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/infrastructure-overview/conditional-orders)
- [Oracle Data](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/infrastructure-overview/oracle-data)
- [Audits](https://docs.synthetix.io/exchange/resources/audits)

## Leveraged Tokens

- [Welcome to Synthetix Leverage](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/welcome-to-synthetix-leverage): The simplest way to trade with leverage
- [Leveraged Tokens](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/leveraged-tokens): Constant leveraged exposure without margin management
- [How Leveraged Tokens Work](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/how-leveraged-tokens-work): The mechanics behind constant leverage
- [Synthetix Perps Engine](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/how-leveraged-tokens-work/synthetix-perps-engine): Synthetix Leveraged Tokens are backed by perpetual futures on Synthetix.
- [Rebalancing](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/how-leveraged-tokens-work/rebalancing): Maintaining a constant leverage factor
- [Keepers](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/how-leveraged-tokens-work/keepers): The keeper network monitors prices and triggers rebalancing events.
- [ERC-20 compliance](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/how-leveraged-tokens-work/erc-20-compliance): Leveraged exposure paired with flexible tokenization
- [Effects of rebalancing](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/how-leveraged-tokens-work/effects-of-rebalancing): A different form of leveraged exposure
- [Fees](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/fees)
- [Guides](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/guides): How to use SLX
- [Minting](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/guides/minting): How to mint a leveraged token
- [Redeeming](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/guides/redeeming): How to redeem a leveraged token
- [Sequential redeeming](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/basics/guides/sequential-redeeming): How to sequentially redeem a leveraged token
- [Official Links](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/more/official-links)
- [Deployed Contracts](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/more/deployed-contracts)
- [Risks & Security](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/more/risks-and-security)
- [FAQ](https://docs.synthetix.io/leveraged-tokens/more/faq)
